Projects

Article Redesign

An exercise in #Grid and the Modular Scale, Typography, Web-fonts, layout and design.

Speedometer

A JQuery/Javascript Back To The Future inspired speedometer and dashboard project.

Abacus

An internal development built with Ruby on Rails, an exercise in paired/group programming. Talk about eating your own dog food.

Position Exercise

An exercise in Position & Z-Index based layout in CSS. I created a mock photography gear reccomendation blog.

Recipe

Design and meta-data exercise using Schema.org information while creating an iPad friendly layout for a recipe.
